markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Lifeblight Residue](/Equipment.aspx?ID=831)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Virulent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=162" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven](/Sources.aspx?ID=49) pg. 66</row>

**Price** 1,100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This black slime is carefully culled from coffins and sarcophagi used by the undead, and is then distilled and combined with necromantic energy, creating a dangerous sludge that leeches life force as aggressively as it rots flesh.

 **Saving Throw** DC 35 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 5d6 negative damage and 3d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 6d6 negative damage and 4d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 7d6 negative damage and 5d6 poison damage (1 round)

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of 8th-level [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Lifeblight Residue
